pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Victorian Spatial Data Through Web File Services (WFS) // Easily interfaces R to spatial datasets available through the Victorian Government's WFS (Web Feature Service): https://servi ces.land.vic.gov.au/catalogue/publicproxy/guest/dv_geoserver/wf s?request=getCapabilities. Which allows users to read in 'sf' data from these sources using lazy evaluation.
